channel.title: [317] Serenthia Beta [PvPAreas,24/7,Highscore,Skills,ZombieHorde,Bosses]!
channel.description:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/j24urectvjkwk5u/basicBanner.png[/img]
[SIZE=5] Please note, make sure you have the latest version of java downloaded to use the client jar[/SIZE] [SIZE=4]Serenthia is a PvP based server 317 revision (with 568 models).
Why Serenthia? We think you should choose Serenthia out of all the other server's for 3 reasons: 24/7 Hosting (100% uptime), Fun friendly environment and we are growing in fantastic features, fast!
Latest:
[ul][*]Added MySQL Implementation; Online players list, Highscore, Personal highscore(profile), Killscore(PvP and PvE). [*]Lots added to Zombie Horde, new waves, zombies do damage and have drops, points, shop, winners. [*]Fixes, fixes and more fixes. Make sure you submit your bug reports! :D[/ul]
How to play: Just go to [URL=http://"http://serenthia.co.uk/"]the website[/URL] and press play now to download the JAR file (Please note you need to install the latest version of Java to play!)
[LEFT] Features include: MySQL Highscore & website implementation. 24/7 Host. PvP everywhere, with select safe areas. World Random Events. Zombie Horde Event. (Forces players to work as a team) Perfect Combat & including magic and range in its entirety Bosses Mini-games Lots of great shops Skilling (All Skills work) (Safe area's to train combat and skills) Lag free and fast host. Many many more. [/LEFT] [URL=http://"http://serenthia.co.uk/clients/client001.jar"]Download[/URL] client and this will automatically download the cache.
JUST IN: [LEFT] Website previews: [SPOILER=MySQL][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/k9iyxu4h5peky81/databasing.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/2i3klj75dkz57e2/highscoreova.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/apqpw72i49disg3/highscorestr.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/mhdeuos8x5pwpbx/personalscores.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/67o6rhwr39zzt78/pvpzhs.png?dl=0[/img][/SPOILER] [/LEFT]
Future updates: [LEFT] [ul][*]More training area's [*]Custom team based PvP minigames [*]Add more safe areas [*]Perfect Skills [*]Tutorial Guide[/ul]
[/LEFT]
[SPOILER=Basic Features Gallery]Perfect combat :D [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img913/7410/V3hsT8.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img673/6421/UTDGg9.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img661/7342/vhtnNF.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img537/9249/0gEUyN.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img910/5890/QTOqRa.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/r9xni0wrg3p76x7/ZombieHorde101.png?dl=0[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/5v1xtbpb0xtttgx/kbd1.png[/img] [SPOILER=More Features Gallery] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/b9kr6zivaw8r2qx/kbd2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/pc0si0dwsklubsa/incrdrprts.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/2t5s6za9mjpd8lr/slrtwr.png[/img][/SPOILER]
Any comments are greatly appreciated. :)
[LEFT]No registration is required at this time, just log in with your desired username and password. In future there will be a register on website, highscore and forum. :) You will receive a starter kit of Combat equipment money and food, you can earn more money by stealing from the tables that are near the bank. To get to a training area ie the rockcrabs there is a teleport in place of varrock for training area's.[/LEFT]
Hope to see you ingame! [/center] [/SIZE]

item.title: [317] Serenthia Beta [PvPAreas,24/7,Highscore,Skills,ZombieHorde,Bosses]!

Loads of updates: Barrows fully working.
Zombie horde fixes, top 3 winners get a reward.

Play now

item.title: [317] Serenthia Beta [PvPAreas,24/7,Highscore,Skills,ZombieHorde,Bosses]!
item.dc:creator: @MrSenior420 MrSenior420
item.description:
@MrSenior420 wrote:

[center]

[SIZE=5]
Please note, make sure you have the latest version of java downloaded to use the client jar[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Serenthia is a PvP based server 317 revision (with 568 models).

Why Serenthia?
We think you should choose Serenthia out of all the other server’s for 3 reasons:
24/7 Hosting (100% uptime), Fun friendly environment and we are growing in fantastic features, fast!

Latest:

[ul][]Added MySQL Implementation; Online players list, Highscore, Personal highscore(profile), Killscore(PvP and PvE).
[]Lots added to Zombie Horde, new waves, zombies do damage and have drops, points, shop, winners.
[*]Fixes, fixes and more fixes. Make sure you submit your bug reports! :D[/ul]

How to play:
Just go to the website and press play now to download the JAR file (Please note you need to install the latest version of Java to play!)

[LEFT]
Features include:
MySQL Highscore & website implementation.
24/7 Host.
PvP everywhere, with select safe areas.
World Random Events.
Zombie Horde Event. (Forces players to work as a team)
Perfect Combat & including magic and range in its entirety
Bosses
Mini-games
Lots of great shops
Skilling (All Skills work) (Safe area’s to train combat and skills)
Lag free and fast host.
Many many more.
[/LEFT]
Download client and this will automatically download the cache.

JUST IN:

Any comments are greatly appreciated.

[LEFT]No registration is required at this time, just log in with your desired username and password.
In future there will be a register on website, highscore and forum.
You will receive a starter kit of Combat equipment money and food, you can earn more money by stealing from the tables that are near the bank.
To get to a training area ie the rockcrabs there is a teleport in place of varrock for training area’s.[/LEFT]

Hope to see you ingame!
[/center]
